duties_responsibilities.duty: Act as a technical resource for Cost Management within the Platinum, Turnaround Methodology work process.
Integrate the project cost estimate, workhour estimate, and project schedule into the Cost Management baseline.
Develop and maintain cost reports, cash flow/cash cancellation curves, and contingency analyses.
Manage monthly closing and accrual for turnaround spend.
Assist turnaround manager develop spending curves and monthly cost forecasts.
Lead the project team in deriving an accurate and realistic forecast of all funds required to complete the project within the defined budget and schedule.
Provide supporting data for project execution metrics, external benchmarking, and turnaround closure.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Finance, or related field (Master's preferred)
